Membrane fraction was preincubated with 1 μM methoxy arachadonyl fluorophosphonate (MAFP) and inhibitor or vehicle as indicated in 50 mM HEPES pH 7.0 for 30 minutes at room temperature.
Undiluted homogenized membrane protein fraction containing hGOAT (protein concentration ˜7 μg/μL) was incubated with 10 μM MAFP and 3×IC50 of inhibitor or equal volume vehicle (DMSO or ethanol) for 30 minutes at room temperature.
